FuncDeclÂ¶

struct asmjit::FuncDecl
#include <func.h>

Function declaration.

Public Functions

uint32_t getConvention()

Get function calling convention, see kFuncConv.

uint32_t getCalleePopsStack()

Get whether the callee pops the stack.

uint32_t getDirection()

Get direction of arguments passed on the stack.

Direction should be always kFuncDirRtl.

Note
This is related to used calling convention, it’s not affected by number of function arguments or their types.

uint32_t getArgStackSize()

Get stack size needed for function arguments passed on the stack.

uint32_t getRedZoneSize()

Get size of “Red Zone”.

uint32_t getSpillZoneSize()

Get size of “Spill Zone”.

bool hasRet()

Get whether the function has a return value.

uint32_t getRetCount()

Get count of function return values.

FuncInOut & getRet(uint32_t index = kFuncRetLo)

Get function return value.

const FuncInOut & getRet(uint32_t index = kFuncRetLo)

Get function return value.

uint32_t getArgCount()

Get count of function arguments.

FuncInOut * getArgList()

Get function arguments array.

const FuncInOut * getArgList()

Get function arguments array (const).

FuncInOut & getArg(size_t index)

Get function argument at index index.

const FuncInOut & getArg(size_t index)

Get function argument at index index.

void resetArg(size_t index)

Public Members

uint8_t _convention

Calling convention.

uint8_t _calleePopsStack

Whether a callee pops stack.

uint8_t _direction

Direction for arguments passed on the stack, see kFuncDir.

uint8_t _reserved0

Reserved #0 (alignment).

uint8_t _argCount

Count of arguments (in _argList).

uint8_t _retCount

Count of return value(s).

uint32_t _argStackSize

Count of bytes consumed by arguments on the stack (aligned).

uint16_t _redZoneSize

Size of “Red Zone”.

Note
Used by AMD64-ABI (128 bytes).

uint16_t _spillZoneSize

Size of “Spill Zone”.

Note
Used by WIN64-ABI (32 bytes).

FuncInOut _argList[kFuncArgCountLoHi]

Function arguments (including HI arguments) mapped to physical registers and stack offset.

FuncInOut _retList[2]

Function return value(s).

FuncBuilderX

FuncInOut
